Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model

Class HephaestusDecorator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model.GodDecorator
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP54.server.model.HephaestusDecorator
All Implemented Interfaces:
Player, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class HephaestusDecorator
extends GodDecorator
Class representing the Hephaestus God Card. From Santorini's rules: "Your Build: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block."
See Also:

      public void move​(Worker worker, Box dest) throws InvalidMoveException
      Method used to perform a move action. Calls the super method and sets the buildToken to 2.
      Specified by:
      move in interface Player
      Overrides:

      Parameters:
      worker - selected worker which the player wants to move.
      dest - selected destination box.

    • build

      public void build​(Worker worker, Box dest) throws InvalidBuildingException
      Method used to perform a build action. Calls the super method and eventually notifies a message to the player in accordance to the building possibilities.
      Specified by:
      build in interface Player
      Overrides:
      build in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      worker - selected worker which the player wants to move.
      dest - selected box where to build.
      Throws:
      InvalidBuildingException - if the build can't be done.

    • chose

      public void chose​(boolean choice)
      Method used to perform a binary choice. If choice is true builds another level on the previously built box, otherwise set them to zero.
      Specified by:
      chose in interface Player
      Overrides:
      chose in class GodDecorator
      Parameters:
      choice - the player's choice.
